page.title: 07THE INDUSTRIAL AREA-CUFFLEY.
page.content: Cuffley is more important as a residential area with only a small corner of the village being utilised for industry.Sopers Road to the South of the Railway Station is the works area. Here you will find St.James Tile Co.Ltd.,D.L.Knight&Son Ltd.Timber and Builders Merchants,Sir William Burnett Timber importers,Cuffley Cutters Ltd.(cardboard manufacturers),the headquarters of Everest Double glazing,the administrative section of Tesco Fresh Foods Ltd.,European Fragrances(manufacturers of fragrances and flavours),Mill Lane Body Repairs,B.&R.Autos,Cuffley Motor Co. Ltd.,and Hockley and Hall Motor Co. Other service companies are scattered around the village and can be found by referring to The Yellow Pages.
